name: Territory of the VIRGIN ISLANDS, petitioner, v. UNITED INDUSTRIAL, SERVICE, TRANSPORTATION, PROFESSIONAL AND GOVERNMENT WORKERS OF NORTH AMERICA SEAFARERS INTERNATIONAL UNION, on Behalf of Ernest BASON.
name_abbreviation: Territory of the Virgin Islands v. United Indus. ex rel. Bason

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Territory of the VIRGIN ISLANDS, petitioner,
v.
UNITED INDUSTRIAL, SERVICE, TRANSPORTATION, PROFESSIONAL AND GOVERNMENT WORKERS OF NORTH AMERICA SEAFARERS INTERNATIONAL UNION, on Behalf of Ernest BASON.

opinions.text: Motion of Office of the Territorial Public Defender for leave to file a brief as amicus curiaegranted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.

casebody.head_matter:
Territory of the VIRGIN ISLANDS, petitioner,
v.
UNITED INDUSTRIAL, SERVICE, TRANSPORTATION, PROFESSIONAL AND GOVERNMENT WORKERS OF NORTH AMERICA SEAFARERS INTERNATIONAL UNION, on Behalf of Ernest BASON.
No. 14-754.
Supreme Court of the United States
April 6, 2015.
